column4: in the latter case, reinstalling the kernel might help, that'll trigger rebuilding the initramdisk
'lspci | grep -i vga' please
if you have a flat panel, it's best to connect it to the gfx card using the digital port

if you expect to keep using it for another while, I suggest you graze the used market for one of the newest available AGP gfx cards

the pci slot doesnt match the card
